body: NTRMAN is amazing as not jap author and artist. His art is awesome and his works are really good (not all, but most) and his main income is patreon. He actually making 2 games so he making only short comics at the moment. If you don't like genre (check his nickname xd) so skip/blacklist it and stop shitposting.
@FunnyFear yeah no doubt it is being sold, ive seen worse on dlsite lmao, I dont understand how it gets the green light either
Is that kind of shit actually being released for sale? Or is it on the web? I can draw tons of shit like this.
Man I wonder how much this artist get bully as a kid for being fat and ugly... lot of it show in his work.
